amendment.description: To provide for the conveyance of land at the Sunflower Army Ammunition Plant, Kansas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3274 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3274 proposed by Senator Dole for Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S6433-6435; text: CR S6434) To provide for the conveyance of land at the Sunflower Army Ammunition Plant, Kansas.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3274 proposed by Senator Dole for Senator Roberts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3274 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
